metadata.description: WESM Must-Run/Renewable Power Station Reference Data
metadata.notes: Station codes follow WESM naming convention. Suffix indicates type: _S=Solar, _W=Wind, _H=Hydro, _BI=Biomass, _B=Battery, _G=Geothermal. First 2 digits indicate grid region.

01GAMU_BL.name: Gamu Biomass
01GAMU_BL.operator: Isabela La Suerte Rice Mill Corporation

08STBARBRA_H.name: Santa Barbara Hydro
08STBARBRA_H.operator: Sunwest Water and Electric Company 2 Inc.

14SULTA_H.name: Sultan Kudarat Hydro
14SULTA_H.operator: Euro Hydro Power Asia Holdings Inc.

weatherMapping.notes: For Visual Crossing API, use latitude/longitude directly or the city name. Group nearby stations to reduce API calls.

ILOCOS_NORTE_WIND.description: Wind farms in Ilocos Norte (Burgos, Pagudpud, Bangui area)
